verses.text: \w That|strong="H3045"\w* thou wouldst rend \w the|strong="H6440"\w* heavens, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* wouldst \w come|strong="H7264"\w* \w down|strong="H6440"\w*: \w the|strong="H6440"\w* mountains \w would|strong="H8034"\w* melt away \w at|strong="H4325"\w* thy \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w would|strong="H6213"\w* melt \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w at|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* burning \w of|strong="H2022"\w* fire, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* waters \w would|strong="H6213"\w* burn \w with|strong="H3381"\w* fire, \w that|strong="H3808"\w* thy name \w might|strong="H2022"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w known|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* thy enemies: \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* nations \w might|strong="H2022"\w* tremble \w at|strong="H3808"\w* thy \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w When|strong="H7200"\w* thou shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* wonderful \w things|strong="H3808"\w*, \w we|strong="H8085"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* bear \w them|strong="H7200"\w*: thou didst come down, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w at|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w presence|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* mountains melted away.

\w From|strong="H2398"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* beginning \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* world \w they|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* \w not|strong="H1870"\w* heard, nor perceived \w with|strong="H2398"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ears: \w the|strong="H0853"\w* eye hath \w not|strong="H1870"\w* seen, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* God, besides thee, \w what|strong="H6664"\w* things thou hast \w prepared|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H1870"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H2142"\w* wait \w for|strong="H1870"\w* thee.

Thou hast \w met|strong="H5375"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* rejoiceth, \w and|strong="H6666"\w* doth \w justice|strong="H6666"\w*: \w in|strong="H1961"\w* thy ways \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H5771"\w* remember thee: behold thou art angry, \w and|strong="H6666"\w* \w we|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* sinned: \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H5375"\w* \w we|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* always, \w and|strong="H6666"\w* \w we|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H5771"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* saved.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H4480"\w* \w become|strong="H7121"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w one|strong="H0369"\w* unclean, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H4480"\w* \w our|strong="H4480"\w* justices \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* rag \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* menstruous \w woman|strong="H8034"\w*: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w all|strong="H4480"\w* fallen \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* leaf, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w our|strong="H4480"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*, \w like|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* wind, \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w taken|strong="H2388"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w away|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w There|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w none|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* calleth \w upon|strong="H3027"\w* thy name: \w that|strong="H3605"\w* riseth \w up|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* taketh hold \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thee: thou hast hid thy face \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w us|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hast crushed \w us|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* iniquity.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w*, \w O|strong="H4994"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, thou art \w our|strong="H3068"\w* father, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H5704"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* clay: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou art \w our|strong="H3068"\w* maker, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H5704"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* works \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy hands.

\w Be|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* very angry, O Lord, \w and|strong="H3389"\w* remember no longer \w our|strong="H1961"\w* iniquity: behold, see we \w are|strong="H6726"\w* all thy people.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* city \w of|strong="H1004"\w* thy \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* desert, Sion \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* desert, Jerusalem \w is|strong="H0834"\w* desolate.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* house \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* holiness, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* glory, \w where|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* fathers praised thee, \w is|strong="H3068"\w* burnt \w with|strong="H3068"\w* fire, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* lovely \w things|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* turned \w into|strong="H5921"\w* ruins.
Wilt thou refrain thyself, O Lord, upon these things, wilt thou hold thy peace, and afflict us vehemently?
